title: Bike Website
description: It's a demo website for online bike shop. Here anyone can buy their favorite bike.
long-description: It is a dynamic website. User can order bike and give review. User can manage their order. It has a dynamic admin panel with certain accessibilities.
technology: REACT, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, Material UI.

title: Tourist Website
description: It is a website to bring Traveler and travel agent together all over the world remotely.
long-description: It is a dynamic website. User can book tour packages. User can manage their order using CRUD Operation. It has a dynamic admin panel with certain accessibility.
technology: REACT, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, REACT Bootstrap.

title: Healthcare Website
description: Heart Line It is a website to bring patient and doctors together from all over the world remotely.
long-description: It is a dynamic website. It has own API created for services and doctors. User can order book appointment. It has an authentication system. User can use register and login features.
